tool_description: This API takes 1-2 keywords and finds the top 10 questions related to those words that are currently being asked in google.
title: Question Explorer

api_list.name: Get top 10 Google questions with keywords.
api_list.description: This endpoint takes keywords and searches the top questions that are currently being asked about those keywords
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://question-explorer.p.rapidapi.com/{questionid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "question-explorer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
